name: MANY-LEGGED THINGS
description:
YOU'RE HUNGRY. TIME TO EAT.

In MANY-LEGGED THINGS, you play a centipede that must survive a hostile nest. Eat and grow!

This game is developed in a day. Post-jam updates will follow.

Direction:
Use the mouse to navigate your centipede. Hold left-click to speed boost. Be the last one crawling.

Developed by: Chin Yong Kian
Music: Heavily slowed down version of Disyman's theme from an older project
